comment: I just finished statistics with Professor Meeks and made a 110 in the class.. She is very easy and gives a TON of extra credit, I used the textbook for the first test then never again after that because we started doing homework and quizzes online.. I highly recommend Professor Meeks
Hard class, but just let me say one word. "Awesome" She really goes out of her way for you. If, like me, you have to take this class, at least take her. She's just awesome.
The class is hard but she is such a great teacher you will enjoy it. She is funny, understanding, and best of all you can get bonus points for doing a little extra work

The actual course is hard but she's such a great teacher she knows it's hard and helps as much as she can. Loads of extra credit, take home test, nightly graded HW, quizzes, attendance mand but you need to be there to know how to do homework, final project is all semester and very easy if done gradually. Made an A and exempted the final.
Two Words: Extra Credit  Two More words: Take her

This class is really boring but easy. There is a lot of extra credit built in but if you like to skip class do NOT take her. She takes attendance every class. Test are take home and online so if you go to class this will be an easy A.

Stats will be confusing: it is stats.  Meek is very friendly and really helps give good grades, she wants her students to succeed.  If you GO to class and do your homework, you will be surprised how well you'll do.  I'd be so stressed out if I had a different teacher right now.

Loved this class. Kind of a monkey-see-monkey-do approach to statistics. Great class to learn about Excel. Homework can be difficult but all you need to do is try and you get credit. Tests are mult-choice take-home. She's really funny while being no-nonsense. Fantastically fun class, I recommend it highly.

Awesome teacher,take home tests, dou your homework you will pass with ease. Start your excel project when it is assigned. It was a bear to complete. I highy recommend her especially if you are not a math major and just wan to be done with math.
Go to class, do your homework... ask lots of questions.  You will do great if you do all of this.

Very nice lady, not the best at giving examples, she takes them straight from the text and presents them on powerpoint.. kindof hard to follow sometimes, but grades really easy. gives extra credit if you turn in all of your homework... DO YOUR HOMEWORK. Tests are take home/ multiple choice.
